content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-05-09 #24714 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.

I don't understand what's going on here. There is now a big diff, but I've re-merged master into bump/v4.21.0, and that into bump/nightly-2025-05-09, and the diff persists.

Can anyone see what is going on? (I'll be on a plane for >=24 hours, so please merge, not just delegate, if you see this in a good state!)
(And more generally, please don't delegate if you can merge, as a general principle. :-)
Stupid question: if #24736 : adaptations for nightly-2025-05-10 gets merged (and I just merged it, the diff was fine) then is whatever problem happened here now moot?
(PS I can't remember why I delegated and didn't merge, but certainly the diff wasn't crazy when I did this, it looked very much like the diff for #24736 in fact)
Yeah, I'll close this now if the adapation for 2025-05-10 went through.
